Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. No. 1 Prop. No. 1 -- 8 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 1 Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 1 of St. Helena Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a special tax of eight (8) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $128,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and keeping in repair the public roads, highways and bridges in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. No. 1 Prop. No. 2 -- 10 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 1 Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 1 of St. Helena Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a special tax of ten (10) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $155,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of maintaining and keeping in repair the public roads, highways and bridges in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. Number 4 -- 10 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District Number 4 of St. Helena Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of ten (10) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $122,500 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of maintaining and keeping in repair the public roads, highways and bridges in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. Number Five Prop. No. 1 -- 5.12 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District Number Five Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Road District Number Five of St. Helena Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of five and twelve hundredths (5.12) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $31,130 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of building, rebuilding, resurfacing, maintaining and keeping in repair all of the public roads, highways and bridges in the District, said millage to represent a twelve hundredths of a mill (.12) increase over the 5 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2015 pursuant to an election held on October 15, 2005?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. Number Five Prop. No. 2 -- 7.17 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District Number Five Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Road District Number Five of St. Helena Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of seven and seventeen hundredths (7.17) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $43,594 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2016 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of building, rebuilding, resurfacing, maintaining and keeping in repair the public roads, highways and bridges in the District, said millage to represent a seventeen hundredths of a mill (.17) increase over the 7 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2015 pursuant to an election held on October 15, 2005?
